body_html:
@furybubu
I've used Amazon Machine Learning for CUDA 9 image (ami-60df1418), and also NVidia's NGC container (docker pull nvcr.io/nvidia/tensorflow:17.10). I have not observed difference on the microbenchmark for those two images.

Verbally I've been told by NVidia employees that getting TF to utilize Volta in NGC container required significant amount of customization from the official version, and that eventually those changes will get merged back into main tensorflow.
